attributes.action: Ban COVID-19 passports, they divide people and highlight personal choices.
attributes.additional_details:
If we exercise of our human right of freedom of expression (1Everyone has the right to freedom of expression,1998.) we are being penalised! 
By taking away our freedom of choice to enter venues, travel abroad or work in some cases (care work), is suppression for millions of adults and children who have CHOSEN not to have your vaccine. You, the government, are choosing to dictate how we live our lives and what we choose to do on a daily basis. How is this legal? We want “covid passports” banned.
attributes.background: Stop penalising people for freedom of choice on what they do with their own body. No one can tell you what to do with your own body. There are countless people of earth who choose not have vaccines, whether that be for tetanus or polio or any other vaccine of their choice. Why is covid different?

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
